Articles.Content:
If you are a long-time KSP player, you probably know of this mod.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/3396-Industrial-Flames-Explosions-Inc-Version-1-4-2-Now-Available%21

For me, it was what got me first into orbit yesiusedallofthemunlandertogetintoorbitshutup, and then to the Mun... and back!

I was very sad when I saw that he was closing the mod- but worse, not allowing anyone to update it at all.

It now serves as a great memory of the KSP past.

EDIT: So a mod moved this. I thought this thread could be useful in talking about the past and early mods...

Not to mention it won't get any replies here. Oh well, I tried.

Edited March 7, 2014 by The Destroyer

Wow, that looks great. A shame that I never got to try that out. Technically, a ModuleManager cfg to make it work would not be illegal, but I think we should respect the authors wishes and not revive it.
